Method.name: Load
Method.Implementation:
if login'=""{ s sc = ##class(GitHub.Login).CreateLoggedSession(login,password,.session) } else{s session = ""}
w !,"Load Organization's properties",! ,"And general properties of Organization's Repositories... ",!,! s sc = ##class(GitHub.OrganizationLoader).Scan( organization, .session ) if 'sc w sc Q sc
w !,"Detail load Organization's Repositories ... " s sc = ##class(GitHub.RepositoryDetailsLoader).Load( organization, .session ) if 'sc w sc Q sc
Q sc

Method.name: Scan
Method.Implementation:
s page = ##class(GitHub.OrganizationLoader).GetPage( organization, 1, .sc, .session ) Q:'sc sc
s sc = page.ParseOrganization() Q:'sc
Q ##class(GitHub.RepositoriesLoader).Load( page )

Method.name: OnOrganization
Method.Description: Event handler <var>data</var> - key-value array with organization properties If handler return 0, parsing will be interrupted
Method.Implementation:
if ##class(GitHub.Organization).NameExists( ..Organization, .id ){ d ##class(GitHub.Organization).%DeleteId(id) }
s data("Name") = ..Organization s data("FullName") = $g(data("FullName")) s data("Description") = $g(data("Description")) s data("OrgLink") = $g(data("OrgLink")) s data("eMail") = $g(data("eMail")) s data("People") = $g(data("People"))
s sc = ##class(GitHub.Organization).Insert( .data )
w ..Organization_" successfuly loaded - id "_$g(data),!,!
Q sc
